headline: Mark Henefeld Joins Roofing Corp of America as Its Chief Financial Officer
summary: ATLANTA, December 01, 2025--Roofing Corp of America is pleased to announce that Mark Henefeld has joined the Atlanta, GA based Roofing Services holding company, as its Chief Financial Officer. Mark arrives at RCA with more than twenty years of experience leading finance and accounting functions at leading industrial and service companies.
